Title: Sunday Holiday
Writer: Jis Joy (screenplay and dialogue), Urasu (story), Kiran V.S. (story)
Actors: Asif Ali, Aparna Balamurali, Sreenivasan, Lal Jose
Plot: Unni Mukundan who is very passionate about his first movie, coincidentally meets director David Paul. At the same time, the life experiences of Amal, who relocates himself to Cochin, makes him undergo a total change in his vision of life.
